body:
I keep on timing out regularly today. When I'm playing a Walls match, everything just stops and then I time out.
Is there a reason for this?
body_tagged:

title: Timed Out

we need ivy to explain this :P

replies.body:
BTW time out= nerd terms for "lost all connections to the server "
It usually happens after a lag spike.[Nobody else moving but you/ you not being able to do anything [Open chests, hit people]

replies.body:
+1
We know it's not a client problem because everyone is timing out. If it was just a few people, it might be a coincidence, but it's highly unlikely considering there are tons of people timing out and the server has crashed like Roman said.
